verses.verse: קָרַ֤עְתָּ <WH7167> that thou wouldest rend שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> the heavens יָרַ֔דְתָּ <WH3381> that thou wouldest come down מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> at thy presence הָרִ֥ים <WH2022> that the mountains נָזֹֽלּוּ׃ <WH2151> might flow down

כִּקְדֹ֧חַ <WH6919> burneth אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> fire הֲמָסִ֗ים <WH2003> As [when] the melting מַ֚יִם <WH4325> causeth the waters תִּבְעֶה־ <WH1158> to boil אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> the fire לְהוֹדִ֥יעַ <WH3045> known שִׁמְךָ֖ <WH8034> to make thy name לְצָרֶ֑יךָ <WH6862> to thine adversaries מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> at thy presence גּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> [that] the nations יִרְגָּֽזוּ׃ <WH7264> may tremble

בַּעֲשׂוֹתְךָ֥ <WH6213> When thou didst נוֹרָא֖וֹת <WH3372> terrible things לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not נְקַוֶּ֑ה <WH6960> [which] we looked יָרַ֕דְתָּ <WH3381> not for thou camest down מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> at thy presence הָרִ֥ים <WH2022> the mountains נָזֹֽלּוּ׃ <WH2151> flowed down

וּמֵעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> For since the beginning of the world לֹא־ <WH3808> or שָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> [men] have not heard לֹ֣א <WH3808> or הֶאֱזִ֑ינוּ <WH238> nor perceived by the ear עַ֣יִן <WH5869> neither hath the eye לֹֽא־ <WH3808> or רָאָ֗תָה <WH7200> seen אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> O God זוּלָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH2108> beside יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> thee [what] he hath prepared לִמְחַכֵּה־ <WH2442> for him that waiteth לֽוֹ׃

פָּגַ֤עְתָּ <WH6293> Thou meetest אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂשׂ֙ <WH7797> him that rejoiceth וְעֹ֣שֵׂה <WH6213> and worketh צֶ֔דֶק <WH6664> righteousness בִּדְרָכֶ֖יךָ <WH1870> thee in thy ways יִזְכְּר֑וּךָ <WH2142> [those that] remember הֵן־ <WH2005> Behold אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> You קָצַ֙פְתָּ֙ <WH7107> behold thou art wroth וַֽנֶּחֱטָ֔א <WH2398> for we have sinned בָּהֶ֥ם עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> in those is continuance וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעַ׃ <WH3467> and we shall be saved

וַנְּהִ֤י <WH1961> have become כַטָּמֵא֙ <WH2931> But we are all as an unclean כֻּלָּ֔נוּ <WH3605> for all וּכְבֶ֥גֶד <WH899> rags עִדִּ֖ים <WH5708> [are] as filthy כָּל־ <WH3605> and all צִדְקֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH6666> [thing] and all our righteousnesses וַנָּ֤בֶל <WH5034> wither כֶּֽעָלֶה֙ <WH5929> as a leaf כֻּלָּ֔נוּ <WH3605> and all וַעֲוֹנֵ֖נוּ <WH5771> and our iniquities כָּר֥וּחַ <WH7307> like the wind יִשָּׂאֻֽנוּ׃ <WH5375> have taken us away

וְאֵין־ <WH369> There קוֹרֵ֣א <WH7121> And [there is] none that calleth בְשִׁמְךָ֔ <WH8034> upon thy name מִתְעוֹרֵ֖ר <WH5782> that stirreth up לְהַחֲזִ֣יק <WH2388> himself to take hold בָּ֑ךְ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִסְתַּ֤רְתָּ <WH5641> of thee for thou hast hid פָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> thy face מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> and hast וַתְּמוּגֵ֖נוּ <WH4127> from us and hast consumed בְּיַד־ <WH3027> us because עֲוֹנֵֽנוּ׃ <WH5771> of our iniquities

וְעַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> now יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אָבִ֣ינוּ <WH1> thou [art] our father אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you אֲנַ֤חְנוּ <WH587> we הַחֹ֙מֶר֙ <WH2563> we [are] the clay וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> and You יֹצְרֵ֔נוּ <WH3335> and thou our potter וּמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> and we all [are] the work יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> of thy hand כֻּלָּֽנוּ׃ <WH3605> and all

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּקְצֹ֤ף <WH7107> Be not wroth יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> O LORD עַד־ <WH5704> beyond מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> very sore וְאַל־ <WH408> not לָעַ֖ד <WH5703> for ever תִּזְכֹּ֣ר <WH2142> neither remember עָוֹ֑ן <WH5771> iniquity הֵ֥ן <WH2005> Behold הַבֶּט־ <WH5027> behold see נָ֖א <WH4994> now עַמְּךָ֥ <WH5971> we beseech thee we [are] all thy people כֻלָּֽנוּ׃ <WH3605> all

עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> cities קָדְשְׁךָ֖ <WH6944> Thy holy הָי֣וּ <WH1961> have become מִדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> are a wilderness צִיּוֹן֙ <WH6726> Zion מִדְבָּ֣ר <WH4057> is a wilderness הָיָ֔תָה <WH1961> has become יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> Jerusalem שְׁמָמָֽה׃ <WH8077> a desolation

בֵּ֧ית <WH1004> house קָדְשֵׁ֣נוּ <WH6944> Our holy וְתִפְאַרְתֵּ֗נוּ <WH8597> and our beautiful אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Where הִֽלְל֙וּךָ֙ <WH1984> praised אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH1> where our fathers הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> has been לִשְׂרֵ֣פַת <WH8316> thee is burned up אֵ֑שׁ <WH784> with fire וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all מַחֲמַדֵּ֖ינוּ <WH4261> and all our pleasant things הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> have become לְחָרְבָּֽה׃ <WH2723> are laid waste

הַעַל־ <WH5921> at אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> these תִתְאַפַּ֖ק <WH662> Wilt thou refrain יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Jehovah תֶּחֱשֶׁ֥ה <WH2814> silent וּתְעַנֵּ֖נוּ <WH6031> and afflict עַד־ <WH5704> beyond מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> diligently ס
